text: Jean Bock (15 January 1931 â€“ 11 September 2022) was a Belgian politician. He was in the Liberal Reformist Party (PRL). Later, he was in the Reformist Movement (MR). He was born in Gouvy, Belgium. He was in the Senate of Belgium from 1995 to 1998. He was Mayor of Gouvy from 1983 to 2004, . ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Belgian mayors
title: Jean Bock
